attributes.action: Prohibit the manufacture and sale of 4x4s
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should phase out the manufacture and sale of 4x4s over a notified period thus acting for the greater good.
4x4s are dangerous to other road users and pedestrians, especially children; give the driver a false sense of security and encourage poor driving skills; emit high levels of pollution and are of no benefit to society
